title: Document Medication Waste
description: A nurse administered only part of a controlled substance and needs another nurse to witness and co-sign the documentation of the wasted portion.

tasks.description: Document the administered portion of the medication in the MAR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse correctly documents the dose that was given to the patient.

tasks.description: Initiate the 'waste' workflow for the remaining portion of the medication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse accesses the controlled substance waste documentation module.

tasks.description: Have a second nurse log in, verify the amount of waste, and electronically co-sign the waste documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The waste is successfully documented and co-signed, meeting legal and safety requirements.
